name: HowNow
description:
HowNow is an AI-powered knowledge platform that helps companies drive productivity and revenue by empowering teams with the knowledge they need, when they need it, right where they work.

With the shelf life of our skills being less than 5 years, it is paramount that organisations move from a compliance training-led culture to a continuous learning culture - however formal learning systems i.e. offsite seminars, retreats, LMSes, are not up to the task because they are expensive, not engaging, unidirectional and not designed for the digital workplace. 

HowNow uses AI to bring together internal and external knowledge from a variety of sources in real-time and then recommend relevant knowledge directly within the applications where your team work, based on their role, skill requirements, learning preferences, benchmark data and context.
marketTags: B2B · SaaS · Mobile · Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Lead
jobs.description:
Until now eLearning has been a rehash of traditional teaching but online, lacking interactivity, flexibility and personalisation - all things we've come to expect from the Internet. HowNow is eLearning 2.0. We're making the smartest tools to help create the smartest people. 

Backed by Mark Pearson (Founder of MyVoucherCodes) and Tennis Star Andy Murray, HowNow are bringing these people together, beyond borders, and changing the way the world learns.

We’re looking for a creative, ambitious and data-driven digital marketing extraordinaire with expertise and experience in SaaS user acquisition and growth hacking.

What you’ll be doing

•	User Acquisition – Hack our customer growth using innovative and lean strategies. This involves planning, creating and implementing marketing campaigns across various acquisition channels. 
•	Reporting – You love data and making sense of it is your forte. From Cohort Analysis to Database Segmentation, you’ll be able to continuously test, report and optimise your campaigns.
•	Paid Advertising – Creating, managing and optimising PPC and Social Media advertising campaigns.
•	Working with Designer and Community Manager to create artwork, engage the customers and develop new business. 
•	Setting up and managing Brand Ambassador programs 
•	Affiliate marketing

What skills you need

•	You’ve got experience and expertise in user acquisition, growth hacking as well as strong analytical and numerical skills to be able to extract insights from data. 
•	You have a great understanding of CPO, CPA, CPC, CPM, CTR and everything else in between, with the ability to report clearly and concisely. 
•	You know how to manage paid advertising across channels such as Facebook, Google Adwords, etc. 
•	Email management and optimisation 
•	A good understanding and experience of successful SEO 
•	SaaS and Edtech experience as well as graphic design skills would be a bonus
•	Highly motivated, autonomous with entrepreneurial flair
•	A history of working hard and getting results. 
•	A love for trying new experiences is a MUST HAVE!

What you get

•	A competitive salary with commission 
•	Work directly with the founders who have built a startup that has been awarded Business of the Year, named Top 100 Startup in the UK and have been recognised by Virgin Media Business as one of the most innovative founders in the UK.
•	Generous perks and holidays 
•	Consideration for share options 
•	Work with a passionate team of hustlers changing the way the world learns. 
•	The satisfaction of building something that matters and spending your time in a meaningful way.

If reading this post has got your excited, send us a message with your CV, a bit about yourself and why you’re applying.

jobs.title: Sales and Business Development
jobs.description:
We’re reinventing eLearning. If you want to change the way the world learns and spend your time making a meaningful impact on the world around you, then join us.


HowNow is a cloud-based platform that provides enterprise-level software to educators of all sizes to create, launch and manage with their own self-branded online school. We’re empowering educators around the world to share and monetise their knowledge, while democratising the access to high quality learning. Backed by Mark Pearson (Founder of MyVoucherCodes) and Tennis Star Andy Murray, HowNow are bringing people together, beyond borders, and changing the way the world learns.


We’re looking for a sales extraordinaire with entrepreneurial flair, brilliant communication skills and the passion to build a startup from the ground up. It’s exactly the right time to join a well funded, startup and grow with the company. The first people who come into the team will have the opportunity to set up the structures and processes, shape the team, and become the future leaders for sales at HowNow.


What you’ll be doing


• You will call, email, send a raven – be creative and sign up brilliant educators and grow the business. 
• Create and implement a target-focused business development strategy
• Own the sales process: Client research, pitch management, pipeline management, sales optimisation and reporting
• Work with clients from demo to software onboarding to account management *Be entrepreneurial by helping others build their business on our business
• Build a community of educators and contribute to democratising education for all.


What you need


• The ability to sell, hit targets and take pride in what you do.
• Creativity, passion and an entrepreneurial flair
• Exceptional communication and presentation skills
• Data-driven with strong analytical skills, comfortable with Excel
• 1+ year experience in B2B sales 
• Experience of online learning as a consumer is a must 
• A history of working hard and getting results.


What you’ll get


• A competitive salary of $32,000 to $37,000 with uncapped commission 
• Work directly with the founders who have built a startup that has been awarded Business of the Year, named Top 100 Startup in the UK and have been recognised by Virgin Media Business as one of the most innovative founders in the UK.
• Generous perks and holidays 
• Ongoing training and investment in your growth
• Work with a passionate team of hustlers who love to have fun while changing the way the world learns for the better.
• The satisfaction of building something that matters.

jobs.title: Ruby On Rails Developer
jobs.description:
HowNow is one of the top 50 technology startups in the UK, disrupting the way the world learns. Backed by Mark Pearson (Founder of MyVoucherCodes) and Tennis Superstar Andy Murray, HowNow is using smart technology to better humans, rather than replace them. 

HowNow is a cloud-based knowledge sharing platform that helps capture and curate knowledge from experts and peers, and deliver it at the point of need in the digital workplace. With the average shelf life of skills being a mere 5 years, it is paramount that organisations continuously invest in upskilling and training their employees. Formal learning systems i.e. offsite seminars, retreats, LMSes, are not up to the task because they are expensive, not engaging, unidirectional and not designed for the digital workplace. We are disrupting this $9bn market with a new product category that brings together content curation, contextual delivery and social knowledge sharing.

The HowNow HQ is based in London and we are in the process of building a new team for our recently opened Mumbai office. We’re looking for a tech extraordinaire with a passion for building products, a history of delivering results and hunger for making a meaningful impact through the work they do. This is an opportunity for the right person to join a well-funded global technology startup and grow with the company. The first people who come into the Mumbai office will have the opportunity to set up the structures and processes, shape the team, and become future leaders of tech at HowNow. 


Responsibilities:
* Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code in Ruby on Rails
* Contribute to architecture and evolution of HowNow platform
* Contribute in all phases of the development life-cycle
* Design, build and own key technology decisions and implementations
* Be an evangelist for Rails and software engineering best practices
* Continually look for opportunities to improve our platform, process and business
* Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies
* Work in an agile environment with quick iterations

Required Skills:
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field
* 3+ years of overall web development experience
* 2+ years experience in developing scalable and robust web applications using Ruby on Rails
* Experience with collaborative code development in small agile teams and managing releases (Git, Continuous Integration, Capistrano)
* Highly proficient in data structure, algorithms, design patterns and databases
* Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery
* Ability to collaborate with other developers and handle entire software development cycle
* Passion to write beautiful and scalable code
* A disciplined approach to development, documentation, and code structure

Preferred
* Experience with JavaScript frameworks such Angular or React
* Experience building internal and external APIs and RESTful web services
* Experience deploying and managing applications on cloud-based infrastructure (Heroku/AWS)
* Experience in delivering products and services in a high growth, startup environment

What’s on offer
* A highly competitive salary (9-14L CTC)  based on experience
* The chance to work on complex and important problems with friendly and curious people in a collaborative environment
* Work directly with the founders who have built a startup that has been awarded Business of the Year, named Top 50 Startup in the UK and * have been recognised by Virgin Media Business as one of the most innovative founders in the UK
* A rare opportunity to develop skills in building both consumer tech interfaces as well core infrastructure back-ends
* Being part of a fast-paced and mission-driven startup made up of a creative, friendly and international team
* Plenty of responsibility, autonomy and encouragement to shape your own tasks and contribute original ideas
* A supportive environment with an intense focus on learning and improvement
* The satisfaction of building something that matters.
* Generous perks and holidays

* Ability to work in an agile environment with rapid iterations
* Basic use of Photoshop/Gimp for image editing and compressions
* Passionate and eager to learn new technologies

Preferred
* Experience with Ruby on Rails would be a big advantage
